verbs.description: Donald Trump [V: has] already asserted a right to pardon himself . Better to give Congress the power to overturn pardons within 30 days , writes Jeremy Mayer , an associate professor at George Mason University .

[ARG0: Donald Trump] has [ARGM-TMP: already] [V: asserted] [ARG1: a right to pardon himself] . Better [ARGM-PNC: to give Congress the power to overturn pardons within 30 days] , writes Jeremy Mayer , an associate professor at George Mason University .
